Package model

Class Order

java.lang.Object
model.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Order extends Object implements Serializable
The Order class is a class in the Model layer that represents an Order instance. The Order class implements Serializable for serialization features
See Also:

    • getConfirmedOrders

      public static List<Order> getConfirmedOrders()
      Getter function to get all confirmedOrders, including previous sessions. Confirmed Orders are serializable and act as a bridge between Customer Orders and Staff Processing Orders
      Returns:
      The list of confirmed orders

    • setDiningMode

      public static boolean setDiningMode(int diningMode)
      Setter function to set the dining mode of the order. Also checks whether the order is in the correct state to set the dining mode Setter Injection as dining mode is selected after creation of order
      Parameters:
      diningMode -
      Returns:
      Whether dining mode is successfully set
